Author: Grebenko
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: How to buy?  In order to exchange ETH on our tokens, you have to participate in KYC process, which involves your personal data being proceeded to 3rd party organizations. 1. Participate in KYC (fill all fields and upload pictures of your documents). 2. Let us check the information provided 3. After getting approved you will receive notification via email, which will contain smart-contract's address. 4. Use any of ERC20-supportive wallets to send ETH to smart-contract's address. 5. Send as much ETH as you wish (make sure to send more than current token's price). 6. Set minimal Gas Limit to 55000. 7. Wait until your transaction gets approved by miners 8. Receive tokens!

Author: sasha.rmnff
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Hello! Happy to get you interested with our project. This is not scam and there are tons of reasons why: 1. We are a team of people sharing same dream – make crypto asset management trustful. 2. Cryptopus is the first platform having both Windows and MacOS prototypes and Web-version also (visit https://cryptopus.ru) 3. Cryptopus is not about making money out of the ICO, it is about raising money out of service we provide. 4. Cryptopus already has a huge GitHub repo, where all our sources are put together (https://github.com/cryptopus) 5. Cryptopus is the first platform, which deployed smart contracts, which let people sign up and get wallets verified (visit our Twitter account for more info) 6. Cryptopus is rated by most popular listings as 4.3/5 7. Cryptopus is going to announce first working case in this month  Please, stay tuned and I hope I reached you!

Author: sasha.rmnff
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Guess what is cryptopus API about to work with? IPLD stands for InterPlanetary Linked Data and this is a protocol, which directly connects Ethereum SC to IPFS and let's us modify IPFS with style.

Author: Grebenko
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Cryptopus pre-ICO is about to end soon and it means, that there are less and less days to buy CPP tokens having 59% bonus! Our last week of the development was full of achievements, that we were planning to achieve. We even achieved more than expected!  Our GitHub-page got new repositories: react-native mobile-apps, react-native desktop-apps. We also are going to release our cryptopus API web-version really soon.  Our team grew and there are new members joined:  Cryptopus PR – Juan Pablo. CTO Cryptopus – Ilya Noskov. React-developer – Nursultan . Marketing-Guru – Nikolay Velikov.  We are now working with many social media channels, which are related to cryptocurrencies and blockchain, and these media are going to publish their reviews soon.  Summing up the last week, we want to mention that there are only 9 pre-ICO days left! We offer 59% bonus right now for each investment! After that and until ICO start there will be no chance to buy our tokens.  Our ICO-campaign is going to start on 26th February 2018 and we are going to offer 3-stage bonus program:  First ICO week 25% bonus; Second ICO week 11% bonus; Third and next weeks 0%;  Right now it is your chance to get more tokens for less ETH!  Cryptopus' smart contract's address is: 0x8193c3C4CDB3472cfC484445b439412AF1974eC7  https://cryptopus.co

Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Hello Folks! In this post we want to announce, that we are going to transfer Ethereum from Smart contract to our wallet (0x9De9223eb770E377ab148B8d37Fee348E8D691bC) in order to start our marketing campaign. Due to technical reasons, there is no way to transfer half of the amount, so we will transfer 100% of it. We are going to exchange 50% of the amount into fiat. The amount left is going to be stored in the wallet until we start Google Ads campaign. The amount, that we are exchanging is dedicated to listings, where we want to be presented. First of all, we want to post cryptopus on icodrops and icobazar, which aren't costless, but have interesting audience. We are happy to infrom you about it. We also are going to post all events connected to it.

Author: sasha.rmnff
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Hello everyone!  We are happy to announce, that our ICO is going to start December third (tomorrow) 12:00AM UTC.  As we know, bitcointalk is the place, where people share the information, so I want to tell you some more about our ICO:  We are going to have a really long-term ICO which is going to start on December 3rd 2017 and end on January 31st 2018. Our soft cap is put around 5000 ETH, which is the minimum sum we want to achieve in order to build a really good insurance fund for our customers. We also have our hard cap – 25000 ETH. This is the maximum sum we are ready to sell. All the tokens unsold are going to be burned.  We are selling 40% of the tokens we have, because other part of emitted sum is dedicated for other purposes, such as market control risks and bounty program.  In order to get our tokens, we kindly ask you to sign up tomorrow after ICO start, paste your eth wallet address into the field, so we can arrange our services to work.  We emit our tokens by using ERC20 standard, which is compatible with MyEtherWallet and we appreciate you using it.  Thank you, for your interest in our project! Feel free to ask any kind of questions wherever you want to! We are happy to answer all of them!

Author: Grebenko
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Hello, folks! In this message we want to inform everyone, that our project is going to move ICO to 2018. There are several reasons to do this: First of all, we are not a project, which raises funds to develop the idea. We collect funds to make the idea worth it. Our goal is to provide the very best service to our users. Second, we realized, that the vision we had before wasn't as straightforward, as we thought. We've got experienced in the field, we work with. Our current vision is more precise, because we've got feedback from people, who work in trading sphere since NASDAQ appeared. Third reason is, that our mission is to bring trust to the cryptocurrency world of trading. Meantime we developing our application, the amount of frauds around trading grew exponentially. We can't stand watching people, who came into the world of cryptocurrencies recently, get broke, because of unprofessional traders making profit out of their trust. Due to lack of juridical regulation it is now impossible to get funds back and this problem grows with each day. We want to stop it and we are about to do it really soon. With publishing our Cryptopus API we are going to spread the information to public and force traders, who want to manage assets of others, to prove their abilities. The so called proof-of-success, which we develop, is going to be part of everybody's life. These reasons unfortunately brought us to the point we are now on. We definitely aren't breaking our smart-contract, but we now limit our crowd-sale to 4 million of CPP tokens. This amount of ETH is the necessary sum, which we will put into our research & marketing. It is now your turn to decide if the project we create is capable to bring trust to the world. P.S. we also please you to mention, that we aren't going to stop the development process and the schedule of releases is not going to change. We just rearrange the way we bring funds into the project.

Author: sasha.rmnff
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: Looking to the similar projects I may say, that first of all, we are fully decentralised. We use IPFS as a database and we create our own blockchain, renting other people's storages in our purposes, paying them in our tokens. We also create the platform, which practically lets people communicate P2P, without anyone between (our competitors use managers inside the platform). We also let people keep anonymous, while working on our platform. As a major benefit we do let people insure their investments on-the-go. We create our inner fund for insurances.

Author: sasha.rmnff
Title: [ANN][ICO] cryptopus – brokerage marketplace
Body: cryptopus      Today, cryptocurrency world is a huge investment field, where people earn benefits as fast as possible. High volatility rate (it even goes up to 30% in 24hr.) creates perfect possibilities to earn and raise money, but sometimes its opposite side shows up and people "loose" all their investments.     There are tonns of ways to raise money, funds and exchange platforms offer their services, but when people avtually want to earn something it is not enough to be lucky, it is neccessary to have financial skills and analytic mind. Even though some "traders" raise lots of money using their "sixth feeling", but it should be mentioned that cryptocurrency world is controlled by "feeling and thoughts" of the mob.  Project's goal  First of, we want to create a place, where people would be able to let professionals earn money using their investments.  Our top advantages      • We created a synchronization mechanism, which wokrs with 4 biggest exchange platforms already. (Kraken, Bitmex, Bitfinex, Poloniex).     • Our platform generates new wallets for brokerage traders every time whey get new investments. Using a smart-contract we create a safe way to let other people "use" money of the investors for purpose.     • Dobule-step storage system lets us syncronize all data in real-time.     • Build on top of IPFS storage system offers a great opportuninty of raising money for those, who let us store data on their computers.     • Two-step storage lets people receive information at any time using P2P systme of IPFS (the most important information is always online).     • Our own tokens are used for transaction safety and keep traders "in platform", what makes it more reliable than any fund today.  Why mankind needs such project?      The raising popularity of cryptocurrencies made a huge effort on conneting people, using one network for their exchanges. Lots of people are ready to receive payments and invest money in cryptocurrecies, but "popular investment way" is a bad practice for mobs, because of the lack of financial education. Even though there are lots of traders, who know how to controll rates and invest their funds. For those traders it is easier to use bigger summs of money to have a better opportunities to invest and controll the situation. There still is no "place", where people coult find professional traders and lend them their money in order to owe more later, so the traders would be able to have more possibilities to raise funds.  Few most important timespots of cryptopus  1. The begging of the development process (13.07.2017) 2. Centralized storage system implementation (25.07.2017) 3. Exchange platform sync. scripts are ready to work (06.08.2017) 4. Replacing centralized storage system with decentralized one (07.08.2017-23.08.2017) 5. pre-ICO preparation process and development of first alpha release (25.08.2017-04.09.2017) 6. Pre-ICO start. Collecting funds to successfully finish the development (10.10.2017) 7. Hard working process before ICO (24.10.2017-24.11.2017) 8. ICO start. Collecting money for marketing and localization (26.11.2017) 9. Further work. Developing "features" of the projects, such as own exchange platform (10.12.2017-...)  !IMPORTANT: today, 15.10.2017 we experienced a new type of fraud. People copy our web-page. Please, be sure that you always stay on http://cryptopus.co
